programme.title: Chasing the Spotlight
programme.desc: Meet three professional performers of differing abilities, who describe the hard work and barriers they break down to express themselves through art.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP13) With his colleague sentenced to hang for murder, Detective Murdoch races to exonerate him and steps into a trap set by the real killer.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ness Murby - Transcending
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) After years of job instability, Ness finally has something to celebrate at work. And, after months of fighting to prove themselves and uncertainty, Ness receives the final decision: will he be retained to Team Canada?
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) A university student and youth activist, Marya is a force to be reckoned with. Marya's got a major online presence but is attending more and more speaking engagements, and is looking for a makeover that embraces her culture and disability.
Année : 2022

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) New miners arrive in Coal Valley in preparation for the reopening of the mine. One of the new miners, Billy Hamilton, takes a special interest in Elizabeth and Jack becomes suspicious of Billy's intentions.
Année : 2014
Réalisation : Anne Wheeler
Avec : Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Gracyn Shinyei (Emily Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen) Andrew W. Walker (Billy Hamilton) Laura Bertram (Mary Dunbar) Derek Hamilton (Dewitt Graves) Loretta Walsh (Florence Blakeley) Lizzie Boys (Cassandra Garner) Sean Michael Kyer (Albert Bickley) Jill Morrison (Carla Noonan)

programme.title: Accidental Activist
programme.desc:
Accidental Activist charts Paul Vienneau's journey from injury to recovery and disability rights activism. the documentary paints a portrait of a complicated man who unintentionally discovered his true calling.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S02EP11) Chef Jonathan Goodyear cooks up hearty comfort foods with the hosts. On the menu: stout cake with cream cheese icing ; beer-braised chicken leg stew ; and a recipe for lentils and sausage.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S05EP09) After suddenly losing his vision from a rare eye disease, professional heli-ski guide Tyson Rettie sets out to find a way to create a way for blind and partially sighted skiers to experience the back country.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S02EP11) Chris and Alex discover a whole new world when they attend a steampunk event. Alex thinks of a surprising way to give an old armoire new life, while Chris makes the workshop more inclusive for cyclists.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S14EP06) Murdoch investigates the death of a harlot promised in a marriage transaction.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP31) You've got questions and we, hopefully, have the answers. On this 'Ask Us Anything' episode of Double Tap TV, guest host Becki Zerr joins Steven Scott and Marc Aflalo to field questions from our audience.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) Denise Justin started an accessible clothing brand when she started to lose her eyesight. The pandemic has slowed things down, and she's looking for advice to build her business.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) Coal Valley is abuzz regarding the annual 'Miner's Games' as Jack continues to worry about the budding relationship between Elizabeth and Billy. Complications arise in Carla's pregnancy.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:
(S14EP10) While Amy works with a challenging horse to help a friend of Clint's, she also revives a dream to rebuild the jumping course that she and Spartan practiced on so many years ago.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc:

Année : 2022

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:

programme.desc:
